title: Getting High ping
body: before patch 7.21 my ping has been really good, but after the 7.21 I have been getting lag. This occurs exactly after 8:00 or 8:30. I do not know if it is my internet or the server

replies.body:
This might not be a result of the patch, but patch days do help detect network problems if it's struggling to grab updates.  Your connection to our services might be degarding and unstable, and there might be some kind of maintenance on your PC or even an ISP issue if it's happening around the same time.  

See if the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide helps, but double check to see if your PC is running any updates at this time.  Reach out to your ISP too if the issue persists and it continues happening on the same time.
